events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate. The resume and cover letter have been submitted successfully.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster due to keywords such as software engineer and development experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage this candidateâ€™s process to ensure a smooth communication channel and timely updates.
Initial screening call completed with the candidate to assess basic qualifications, experience, and interest in the software engineering role.
Candidate responded promptly with enthusiasm confirming availability for the next stages, showing strong interest in the technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-05 at 10:00 AM UTC, focusing on software development skills and problem-solving capabilities.
